Uses of Class
io.atomix.catalyst.serializer.Serializer

  • Packages that use Serializer 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.catalyst.buffer
    Provides a low-level Buffer abstraction backed by on- or off-heap memory, memory mapped files, or RandomAccessFile.
    io.atomix.catalyst.serializer
    Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.
    io.atomix.catalyst.transport
    The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Catalyst clients and servers communicate.
    io.atomix.catalyst.util.concurrent
    Utilities for thread management and asynchronous workflows.
